title: On Hemant Soren's Mining Lease To Himself, Poll Panel's Tough Question - NDTV
content: On Hemant Soren's Mining Lease To Himself, Poll Panel's Tough Question  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: The Election Commission has sent notice to Jharkhand Chief Minister Hemant Soren, asking that he explain why action should not be taken against him over allegations of the grant of mining license in Ranchi to himself in June 2021.
